titles.title: A bill to redesignate Capulin Mountain National Monument as Capulin Volcano National Monument in the State of New Mexico, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Interior Department. Favorable.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 1/21/1987--Introduced. Redesignates the Capulin Mountain National Monument, New Mexico, as the Capulin Volcano National Monument. Transfers jurisdiction over the federally owned lands within the revised boundaries of the Monument to the National Park Service.
